name: Nina & Yuri
description:
An update that fix some bugs and the glitch in the second level will come after the result of the Emotional Game Jam !

Nina & Yuri is a Submission for the Emotional Game Jam 2022, made in 48 hours, with the theme Off-Road and Eternal Return.

You play as Nina, a girl who will need to cross several theater scene to save her soulmate Yuri.

For a Better Experience, don't read what's bellow before playing ! 

We decide to interpret the theme Off-Road by making a Level Design that is non-linear and tricks the player's mind as he as to think of the environment in three dimensions and two dimensions in the same time.  Eternal Return is the feeling of doing something on repeat, like the goal of saving someone in a plateform game, or a theater piece that play on repeat !

The game was made by "A cup of Team" composed by : 

Yvain / Octy - 2D Artist, 3D, Rough Animation, VFX Animation, Logo Artist

Steven Favre - Game Designer, Level design, Modelisation, UI/UX

Tom Gâtineau - Intégration, Programmation, Modélisation, Level design, Texturing

Clara Giraud - Integration, Programmation, UI, Sound Design 

Albin Hincourt - 2D Artist, Concept Art, Chara Design, Background Art, Animation Clean-Up, Colorist
